type: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc
typeCode: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown
issuedBy: Internet of logistics code of issuing party.
key: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

company.RoleCode: Company's role code - e.g. AA, AB...
company.RoleName: If no RoleCode provided, role name - e.g. Consignor, Exporter, Manufacturer, Carrier, FreightForwarder, Consignee, Importer, Payer, Payee, ShipTo, ShipFrom, BillTo, BillFrom, RemitTo, RemitFrom, Shipper
company.SecurityClassification: Security status - e.g. RA - Regulated Agent, KC - Known Consignor or AO - Aircraft Operator
company.Name: Name of company or organization
company.IATAcargoAccreditationNumber: IATA accredited cargo agent number or identifier
company.IATAcargoCASSnumber: IATA CASS cargo agent branch number or identifier
company.IATAairlinePrefix: IATA three numeric airline prefix number

IDother.Description: Description of ID - e.g. PIMA address, Account number, VAT/Tax id, Legal Registration id…
IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO, IRS, FR VAT, DE VAT, CCS…
